Brightwing Abilities & Talents :: Heroes of the Storm (HotS)

Brightwing

Title: Faerie Dragon
Role: Healer
Franchise: Warcraft
Price: 625 Gems | 7k gold

Statistics
Health1,425(+4.0%)
Regen2.97(+4.0%)
Mana500(+10)
Regen3.00(+0.098)
Atk Speed1.11 per second
Damage81(+4.0%)
Like many Faerie Dragons, Brightwing is happiest darting around the forests of Ashenvale, healing friends, and then grabbing a light snack. By the way, did you know a human head only weighs ten pounds? Talk about light!
Builds & Guides Abilities & Talents Discussion

Explore Brightwing’s abilities including: combat trait, base abilities, heroic abilities, and abilities gained through talents. You can also find Brightwing’s talent tree at the bottom of the page.

Special Mount
Phase Shift
After 2 seconds, teleport to an allied Hero and heal them for 25% of their maximum Health.
Combat Trait
Soothing Mist
Activate to remove all Stun, Root, Slow, and Silence effects from nearby allied Heroes.

Passive: Brightwing heals nearby allied Heroes for 110 (+4% per level) every 4 seconds.
Abilities
(Q) Arcane Flare
Shoot a flare dealing 75 (+4% per level) damage to enemies hit, and an additional 105 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in the center. If a Hero is hit by the center, Soothing Mist's passive healing instantly activates.
(W) Polymorph
Polymorph a target for 1.5 seconds, Slowing their Movement Speed by 30% and Silencing them. Targets are not able to attack while Polymorphed.
(E) Pixie Dust
Increase target Hero's Movement Speed by 20%, and grant them 30 Spell Armor for 3 seconds, reducing Spell damage taken by 30%.
Heroic Abilities(Granted at level 10)
(R) Blink Heal
Teleport to a nearby ally. When teleporting to a Hero, heal them for 200.

Stores up to 2 charges.
(R) Emerald Wind
After 0.5 seconds, create an expanding nova of wind, dealing 225 (+4% per level) damage and pushing enemies away.
Abilities Gained Through Talents
